description: A channel receives events from a specific source (such as an on-premises storage solution or application, or a partner event data source), and delivers the events to one or more event data stores. You use channels to ingest events into CloudTrail from sources outside AWS.

Destination.description: The resource that receives events arriving from a channel.

Type.description: The type of destination for events arriving from a channel.
Type.markdownDescription:
The type of destination for events arriving from a channel.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: EVENT_DATA_STORE  
Update requires: No interruption

Location.description: The ARN of a resource that receives events from a channel.
Location.markdownDescription:
The ARN of a resource that receives events from a channel.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Pattern: (^[a-zA-Z0-9._/\-:]+$)  
Update requires: No interruption

ChannelArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a channel.

ChannelName.markdownDescription:
The name of the channel.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3

Pattern: (^[a-zA-Z0-9._\-]+$)  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Source.markdownDescription:
The ARN of an on-premises storage solution or application, or a partner event source.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: (.*)  
Update requires: Replacement
